tool_description: Easily generate random users with this API. Get realistic information such as name, surname, email address, and more with a simple API call. Perfect for testing applications, creating sample data, or adding realism to your projects
name: Random User Generator API
title: Random User Generator API

api_list.name: Get random user
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-user-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/random-user/getrandomuser"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-user-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-user-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/random-user/getrandomuser"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-user-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
